ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fsummulc2.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) |
| 2 |  | fsummulc2.2 | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | fsummulc2.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | fsumdivc.4 | |- ( ph -> C =/= 0 ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_reccld | |- ( ph -> ( 1 / C ) e. CC ) |
| 6 | 1, 5, 3 | #P_fsummulc1 | |- ( ph -> ( sum_ k e. A B x. ( 1 / C ) ) = sum_ k e. A ( B x. ( 1 / C ) ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 3 | #P_fsumcl | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A B e. CC ) |
| 8 | 7, 2, 4 | #P_divrecd | |- ( ph -> ( sum_ k e. A B / C ) = ( sum_ k e. A B x. ( 1 / C ) ) ) |
| 9 | 2 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> C e. CC ) |
| 10 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> C =/= 0 ) |
| 11 | 3, 9, 10 | #P_divrecd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> ( B / C ) = ( B x. ( 1 / C ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_sumeq2dv | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A ( B / C ) = sum_ k e. A ( B x. ( 1 / C ) ) ) |
| 13 | 6, 8, 12 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( ph -> ( sum_ k e. A B / C ) = sum_ k e. A ( B / C ) ) |
